lines.text: He's heading right for the ammunition dump.
I've heard of Hell's Angels, but I never thought I'd see one.
[Bugs Bunny then sees Yosemite Sam's spirit, rising, and playing a harp, as cartoon concludes]
Well, what do you know? There's the little Wiener schnitzel, now. I'll just drop him this, of my esteem.
[while flying over him, Bugs Bunny dropped a note to the German Red Baron]
[Baron starts reading note, dropped by Bugs]
Roses are Red. Violets are Blue. A leghorn is a chicken. And so are you! Why that dumb-cuff, he even spelt my name, with a small b!
I enclosed a big "B", in the flowers.
